definition: Description of the digital method of distribution.
The organization sharing, publishing, or otherwise responsible for providing access to the resource.
The type of service endpoint used for distribution.
URL of the service endpoint, API, etc.
Date the resource was last updated, or creation date if no updates have been made, YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM or YYYY.
Date the metadata record was last updated.
If the data are regularly updated, how often.
Constraints or restrictions on use of the resource.
Organizational affiliation for the responsible point of contact.
Email for the responsible point of contact.
Name of the responsible point of contact.
use: Required for Dataset, Optional at lower levels

definition: The role or responsibility of the point of contact.
Placename from GeoNames (http://www.geonames.org).
Coordinates for the bounding box describing the extent of the resource in decimal degrees.
validation: Array: Decimal Degrees or Geometry: Polygon

definition: Time period to which the data refer as a single date/time, multiple dates/times, or a range of dates/times in ISO 8601. This reflects the time period covered by the data, not the dates of coding or making documents machine-readable or the dates the data were collected. Also known as span.

TBD
An account of the resource. Description may include but is not limited to: an abstract, a table of contents, or a free-text account of the resource.
The type of content in the resource and optionally format. For files uploaded to TDIS/
Subject matter keywords from the vocabulary chosen in Keyword Vocabulary.
Vocabulary for subject matter keywords listed in Keyword Term.
Purpose for the creation of this resource and/or expected use.
A name given to the resource.
Description of the attribute (field, variable) within the attribute table for this layer.
Domain for values in the attribute (field, variable) within the attribute table.
Name of the attribute (field, variable) within the attribute table for this layer.
URL for the published code set.
use_condition: Attribute Domain Type: Published Code Set

definition: The procedure, technique, or mode of inquiry used to attain data.
Valid value for the attribute.
Description of the valid value for the attribute.
Numeric value for the accuracy in meters.
Method for determining accuracy of the data.
TBD
A horizontal datum is a specified coordinate system for a collection of positions on the surface of the earth.
The date when a particular processing step was completed, YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM or YYYY.

Description of the processing step performed on a date. A processing step represents a structural change to the data (such as adding fields) and not the addition of data. There can be several processing steps, each of which may have a different date.
Range of valid values separated by a dash ("-").
Numeric value for the accuracy in meters.
Method for determining accuracy of the data.
TBD
A vertical datum is a surface of zero elevation to which heights of various points are referenced.
